 2024-07942024-06-21FIN
ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Finance of RAYMOND IVANY, O.C., O.N.S., of Wolfville, Nova Scotia, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 28, 2027.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Finance of RAYMOND IVANY, O.C., O.N.S., of Wolfville, Nova Scotia, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 28, 2027.
